FuncDef:
The authentication update-ip-accounting enable command enables a device to send accounting packets for terminal address updating.
The undo authentication update-ip-accounting enable command disables a device from sending accounting packets for terminal address updating. The authentication update-ip-accounting enable command enables a device to send accounting packets for terminal address updating. The undo authentication update-ip-accounting enable command disables a device from sending accounting packets for terminal address updating. By default, the device is enabled to send accounting packets for terminal address updating. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
